address: 680 Oakwood Loop, San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Roughhouse Brewing is a family-owned and operated craft brewery located on five acres of the Pasternak family ranch in the hill country of San Marcos. Customers can relax inside the rustic brewery barn or in the oak-surrounded outdoor seating area and enjoy live music on the weekends.

about: The Vault is a popular nightlife spot on the Square in Downtown San Marcos. The name pays homage to when the building was the "Old State Bank" and the vault inside was blown up with nitro by the Newton Gang, waking up the neighborhood. The gang emerged with $24,000 and they simply walked out of town.
